mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memberid, member_password, confirmPassword, memberName, memberDepartment, memberPosition, memberEmploymentDate, memberBirth, memberEmail, email_verifycode, TermsAgreed, applicationDate, updatedAt, employmentStatus) VALUES (#{memberid}, #{member_password}, #{confirmPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberDepartment}, #{memberPosition}, #{memberEmploymentDate}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberEmail}, #{email_verifycode}, #{TermsAgreed}, NOW(), NOW(), #{employmentStatus}, #{permission})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY applicationDate DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
